webwork-tex.statement: \par Calculate the length of the path over the given interval. \[c(t) = (9 t + 1, 9 - 8 t), \, 0 \le t \le 2\] \par \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \par
webwork-tex.solution:
\par \par {\bf Solution: }\par \par {\bf Solution: } Since \(x = 9 t + 1\) and \(y = 9 - 8 t\) we have \(x' = 9\) and \(y' = - 8\). Hence, the length of the path is \[S = \int ^2 _0 \sqrt{9^2 + (- 8)^2} \, dt = 12.0416 \int ^2 _0 \, dt = 2\sqrt{145} = 24.0832\]
\par
